subject: Database for tests using JUnit.
msgSnippet: Hello, Can someone please explain me the how to create a Comma seperated database file which can be given as input to A JUnit testcase and the result be
messageBody:
Hello,
Can someone please explain me the how to create a
Comma seperated database file which can be given as
input to A JUnit testcase and the result be redirected
to another textfile. I wonder if someone has already
worked on something similar to this. I would
appreciate if someone could atleast point me towards
some article related to this topic.

thanks,
Prashant.
